website_summaries.verdict: Adjustable shelves make this a great choice for storing books.
pros: Has adjustable shelves to meet the needs of your book collection
Assembly is easy, with included instructions
Case rotates well even under heavy weight
cons: Some customers found the composite wood to be too flimsy and prone to scratching

customer_reviews.title: Happy overall but some drawbacks
customer_reviews.text: Probably not ideal for someone inexperienced in furniture assembly. Picture was a bit misleading because it shows 7 shelves but only after I received the product did I realize that they are displaying home goods and CD cases, not DVDs. Only fits 5 standing dvd sized shelves per side. Each shelf holds 22-23 dvd cases. Would advise you to measure and mark your shelves (holes) before you install the fixed (stabilization) shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Enchanted April

customer_reviews.title: just get it
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice spinning tower. Before it arrived, my cd's were housed in those long plastic towers. It got to the point where I couldn't fit anymore in the room and my cd's were in growing in piles on the floor. So, I ordered this and I can't tell you how much cleaner the room looks with 1 central storage unit. It didn't take too long to assemble and you don't need much clearance to spin it. By time I was done moving everything over, I used every shelf. I will order another one when that fills up.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Nice thread rack!!!
customer_reviews.text: An unusual use for this product and it works great! I am using this in my quilt studio to store thread. I have different sizes of cones and they all fit perfectly. The double sides are a perfect way for each color to show without getting lost in the back. I was skeptical of the rotating device being able to support the weight but it work without any problems - except I may have to buy another since I still have thread in 5 boxes!!! I not only recommend this product but will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Char Jorgensen

customer_reviews.title: Love this shelf
customer_reviews.text: Only giving 4 stars because one of the panels was all scratched up. Since it was on the inside where the shelves would go, I didn't bother with the hassle of packaging it all back up and returning it. There was a lot of sawdust, so if you choose to assemble this yourself, be prepared to clean. Love this shelf, though. It easily held our CD's, Blu Rays, and DVDs. It takes up very little space compared to the last shelf I had that didn't even hold everything, and it was fairly easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot of DVD’s
customer_reviews.text: I used this to store all my DVD’s in my living room and I love it! I love that it holds so many and that it swivels. It took me about an hour and a half to unpack and put together... (I’m also a huge direction reader so I’m sure I took longer than the average person). We get lots of compliments and this ends up being a focal point in our living room because everyone usually wants to see what DVD’s we have!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: All Scratched pieces on both orders
customer_reviews.text: This product was a piece of garbage. We ordered it and it came with two broken pieces and scratches covering all of the other pieces. We sent it back and ordered another one because we did not see other reviews saying they received scratched pieces so we thought perhaps we just got a bad one. The second one came and it too had pieces full of scratches. We had to return that one as well. Spend your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Monica D.

customer_reviews.title: and liked it so much that I got another (for the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these to hold my DVDs and Blu-Rays in my new living room, and liked it so much that I got another (for the rest of my collection). They were very easy to put together; just make sure all the finished edges are facing outwards. It will obviously fit more Blu-Rays as the shelves are adjustable in size. They work great without taking up too much space. We use the top as a shelf for a small speaker or pictures.
customer_reviews.author: andie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product if it Arrives Intact
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, especially for the money. Assembly is easy, and it's very sturdy once assembled. Unfortunately, my arrived damaged, and had to be boxed up and sent back. However, the seller was prompt to accept my return and refund my money. I wouldn't let this discourage your purchase, because I'm pretty sure my experience was just luck of a draw.
customer_reviews.author: Jason G.

customer_reviews.title: which is nice in case I decide to ever rearrange it
customer_reviews.text: I don't think there's an "optimal" media type for this, because even the CDs seem to have a gap that's a bit larger than preferred. I use it for games, movies, CDs, and a few books, so I do have some extra shelves, which is nice in case I decide to ever rearrange it.
customer_reviews.author: bassoon713

customer_reviews.title: Nice Medium Sizes Rack Cd and Dvd
customer_reviews.text: Tons of pieces to assemble. I though the instructions were a bit too short. Nice unit for a small space. Turns very well, and looks nice. Classy look to my media area.
customer_reviews.author: Woods Dad

customer_reviews.title: Good, compact storage for CD's
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to assemble and well built for the money. Space saving design allows me to store a lot of CD's in one compact space.
customer_reviews.author: tourniquet_fan

customer_reviews.title: Hold all my glitters
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep all my glitters and accessories together and it is really handy. I added some wheels on the bottom although it already swivels but now I can move it back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: Blessedmom

customer_reviews.title: The best DVD holder that spins
customer_reviews.text: It's heavy duty good quality. It saves space and Spins nice and free on turntable. Holds a lot of DVDs and CDs and VHS tapes for people that still use VHS tapes.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: I like mine
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Easy to put together. Sturdy. Holds quite a bit. Looks good.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: One disappointment
customer_reviews.text: When you put the unit together you must put in a permanent shelf and when you do you can not make the sides a side of DVD and the other a side of CD's. Other than that, it works well and holds up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together.  Easily accessible. Stores all our DVDs.
customer_reviews.text: This tower is great! Bought it for my Mom to store her DVDs and she loves it. Easy to put together. Easy to use. Hasn't had any issues storing different sized DVDs. I personally own a 4 sided one and would buy the 2 sided myself, if I had less DVDs.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Fairclough

customer_reviews.title: Right for my space and needs.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with all pieces and instructions, one piece was a bit scatched, but I was able to conceal it. Seems to work- not hard to build, though I placed the permanent shelf in the wrong place- that’s on me.
customer_reviews.author: UHE-musician

customer_reviews.title: Looks good!
customer_reviews.text: Parts of the instructions were a bit confusing. But I end up getting it built an hour later. Lol I do wish it was a tad bit taller but the price is good for the height. Also it’s a little flimsy when spinning. But over all it’s cool!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Murga

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this item
customer_reviews.text: This is #3 and #4 that we've purchased of this particular item. It worked very well for us, but we have so many dvd's, cd's and videotapes that we decided to purchase 2 more of them. They're easy to put together, Dad & I did them in about 45 minutes and they don't take up much space, as long as they have the space they need to spin! Love Love Love them and they're a great price!!
customer_reviews.author: kandismom322

customer_reviews.title: Good Value For The Money
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived well packed and with none of the blemishes others have noted. For the price,it is a good value and not bad looking. However, it could be improved with better shelf-to-shelf spacing options to accommodate out-sized Blu-Ray and DVD cases.
customer_reviews.author: Jack B, aka Bigwoof

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: The tower was received in excellent condition--no knicks, no dents, no scratches. It took two of us about an hour to put it together, with only one problem: one of the long screw's head was stripped, but we did have another one available that was long enough. The product is as advertised, nothing fancy, yet attactive and functional. If needed, I would purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Buster's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit but didn't receive all the parts
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit but didn't receive all the parts, and there was a lot. had to wait about 10 days for a key piece. I was satisfied when put all together.
customer_reviews.author: robert l jones

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed with this product, I didnt know how it was going to be but I knew I wanted a turning media shelf and for the price, this is awesome 👌
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: serves a purpose
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box, I was greeted by sawdust all over the place. I had to get my shop vac to clean up the mess. I had to vacuum each piece separately. The assembly was ok and it does serve the purpose of holding my CD collection. This is the second tower i have. I bought the first over 10 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: GREAT STORAGE UNIT FOR CD S AND DVDS.
customer_reviews.text: JUST RECEIVED MY SWIVEL CD..DVD HOLDER ...I PUT IT TOGETHER MYSELF AND FOUND THE INSTRUCTIONS A LITTLE CONFUSING ...(NOT ENOUGH INFORMATION) BUT ONCE I HAD IT PUT TOGETHER I FOUND IT TO BE STURDY AND WILL BE A GREAT ADDITION TO MY MOVIE AND MUSIC COLLECTION.
customer_reviews.author: MARSOC MOM

customer_reviews.title: Great - but watch out for that Rogue Shelf
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty good. Holds lots of stuff. Looks nice. Swivels. The only knock on it is that it doesn't tell you where to put the permanent shelf..so I took a stab in the dark...and I was wrong. I wasn't about to take the whole thing apart to adjust the shelf, so now I have a rogue shelf on one side that throws everything else off. A little annoying, but I can live with it.
customer_reviews.author: DeRock

customer_reviews.title: great item
customer_reviews.text: Way too many shelves. Who still has CDs?? You end up with a lot of extra stuff, but I really love this thing. It doesn't really like it when you mix blu ray shelves with DVD shelves as you end up with too much space or not enough.
customer_reviews.author: fun times

customer_reviews.title: This work great with my dvd's and old viedos
customer_reviews.text: I like this but gave it a four star because it was not clear on how to put it together and the person that put it together for me put it together wrong, Now I have one permanent shelft that is sideways. It looks good in my media room and you can turn it around so no one can see the sideways shelf.
customer_reviews.author: BABS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It is Awesome - I mainly wanted it for my dvds , but ended up better by having small space for my music cds too
customer_reviews.author: Kideo Cash

customer_reviews.title: Easy, practical CD storage
customer_reviews.text: This multimedia towerwas easy to assemble and provides large storage to conveniently organize your collection. Quality is ok, although ballbearing swivel mechanism would've been nice. The unit is fairly stable when assembled, although I don't know how long it will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Canon man 123

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put together and fine quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Everything came in the box, but the box was extremely beat up and there were scratches that I covered with a black sharpie. It was easy to put together and fine quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: J Wells

customer_reviews.title: Worth the mondey, fairly easy to assemble, takes up little space.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I would give this item 4 1/2 stars. This storage unit solved my CD storage problem; now very easy to access.
customer_reviews.author: Cinelmar

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it is great. My 82 year old mother put it together ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a 4 stars because of the very top piece is not finished on the bottom. You can see that it is not finished if sitting down across the room. Other than that it is great. My 82 year old mother put it together in no time at all.
customer_reviews.author: michelle mosley

customer_reviews.title: It does not take up a lot of space horizontally
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small apartment at the moment and I really like it because it does not take up a lot of space horizontally on the floor & it can turn around easily.
customer_reviews.author: Darrick Lin

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and Very Cheap Material and Build Quality
customer_reviews.text: In this case, for the price, I do believe you should be getting something of higher quality. This is extremely flimsy and very cheap material. The end cracked with I lifted it up and I had to use and adhesive velcro tape to attach it to another piece of furniture so it wouldn't run the risk of tipping over. Please avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick R Brown

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Cool
customer_reviews.text: This storage tower's pretty awesome! It took me about few hours to assemble it, but worth it and quite simple. I used it to store manga collections.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Simple enough to put together. It was shorter than I'd expected, but easily held all of our DVD's, BlueRay's, and computer games with room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: 911pandora

customer_reviews.title: Great Tower
customer_reviews.text: Great tower for all you DVD's, CD's or VHS tapes. Love that it spins so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Hastings

customer_reviews.title: Saves space and easy to display one's collection
customer_reviews.text: Media, video games, etc. Saves space and easy to display one's collection.
customer_reviews.author: Judith E. Deck

customer_reviews.title: Media Storage.
customer_reviews.text: It was so easy to put together, doesn't take up much space and holds a lot of dvds. Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Peaches

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Sooo easy to put together and customize. I put this together by myself in 15-20 minutes with absolutely no problem. I am very pleased with this product and am considering buying another one for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is a good product. It held everything we needed to put in it.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Rollie

customer_reviews.title: critique of media tower
customer_reviews.text: Had some problems assembling the unit due to particle board fixed shelf which cracked on one edge where it fastened to the side panel. this made it difficult to insert the cardboard divider. Also the black finish attracts dirt like a magnet. Should have ordered the wood grain finish instead. The size and swivel feature is great!
customer_reviews.author: Marian

customer_reviews.title: Was very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my basement room. Was very easy to put together. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Di Orio

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but barely.
customer_reviews.text: Average product. Was not packed properly and was in only acceptable condition. The wood was chipped in many places. And no holes for fixed shelf. To much work to return. Not recommended in present condition. Needs improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Beasley

customer_reviews.title: Prepac Black Swivel Media Storage Tower
customer_reviews.text: It has more then ample space for all types media, takes up very little room and I the swivel makes it easy to view all your media with little effort.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Petro

customer_reviews.title: lots of work putting together and one piece came broken
customer_reviews.text: Came with one broken piece. By the time I figured it out, it was almost full together, I didnt want to take the entire thing apart just to send back and get new one.
customer_reviews.author: poland00

customer_reviews.title: ARRIVED AS DESCRIBED. WISH IT HELD MORE. THANKS ...
customer_reviews.text: ARRIVED AS DESCRIBED. WISH IT HELD MORE. THANKS. KISHA M.
customer_reviews.author: Kisha

customer_reviews.title: the only reason I am not giving it a five ...
customer_reviews.text: the only reason I am not giving it a five star is one of the permanent shelves was put in backwards and we had to paint it black.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Lang

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: lasts a long time but a bare to keep the shelves on the swivel and the piece that made the swivel turn was not with it
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: why I do not leave reviews
customer_reviews.text: I would write this if U-Verse was a faster internet provider, as it promised, it is'nt so I don't. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jackw

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra Money
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this tower after the other rack I ordered was too unsteady. I love the being able to spin it around.
customer_reviews.author: CB

product_meta.title: Prepac Two-Sided Spinning Tower Storage Cabinet, Black
product_meta.description: Store and access your media collection with ease thanks to our 2-Sided Spinning Tower. This versatile unit spins effortlessly, making it easy for you to get at your collection from both sides. Occupying just over one square foot of floor space, it’s perfect for collectors with small spaces. With thirteen adjustable shelves, sorting, filling and rearranging your collection has never been simpler. Start your collection right with this functional piece.
feature_bullets: Finished in durable deep black laminate
14 adjustable shelves hold a variety of media sizes
Capacity: 512 CDs, 220 DVDs, 384 Blu-Ray discs, 120 VHS cassettes or any combination thereof
Ships Ready to Assemble, includes an instruction booklet for easy assembly and has a 5-year manufacturer’s limited warranty on parts
Manufactured in Canada and meets all North American safety standards

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars132 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
